item.description:
Join us at the Bicycle Coalition of Maine's annual pizza party at Flatbread Pizza Co., 72 Commercial St., Portland on June 15 from 5 to 9 p.m. This popular event includes the unbeatable combination of pizza, beer and bicyclists. You can catch up with friends and plan summer bicycling adventures, or perhaps even find some new biking partners.

Flatbread will donate a portion of the proceeds from every pizza sold during the evening (including takeout orders) to the coalition. Shipyard Brewing Co. will donate $1 for every beer sold.

So come eat, drink, socialize with other cyclists and help support the coalition's work to improve bicycling in Maine. For more information, please call (207) 623-4511.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red "Meetup" t-shirt and yellow BCM hat.
item.name: Bicycle Coalition of Maine Pizza Party
